segments.text: Did you see the fashion awards last night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I sat through about half of it but they lost me after that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not really , to be honest . Some of what they call fashion looks terrible to me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But they are showing what will be all the rage next year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All the rage with whom ? I never see anyone wearing these designs on the street .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you know that fashion is cyclical ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Precisely ! For example , Flares were popular for a while , then went out of fashion . Now we can start to see them coming back in again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They're also known as bell-bottoms . They are a type of trousers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's too complicated . I'll just stick to the plain clothes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's fine , but then you'll always look plain .
segments.speaker: S1
